description: Yanfei è un avvocato di Liyue che utilizza il potere del Pyro. Eccelle negli attacchi caricati e nel danno Pyro, specialmente con le sue Seal of Approval.

weapons.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

artifacts.name: Crimson Witch of Flames (2) + Wanderer's Troupe (2)
Shimenawa's Reminiscence (2) + Crimson Witch of Flames (2)

info: Yanfei si concentra su attacchi caricati e danno Pyro. Priorità a CRIT, ATK% e Elemental Mastery per massimizzare i danni da Vaporize/Melt.

weapon.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

skills.name: Normal Attack: Seal of Approval
skills.desc: Performs up to 3 attacks using fire, dealing Pyro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 3 attacks using fire, dealing Pyro DMG.
Charged Attack
Consumes Stamina and all Seal of Approval stacks to dive towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path and dealing AoE Pyro DMG upon impact.
Plunging Attack
Gathering the power of Pyro, plunges toward the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path and dealing AoE Pyro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Signed Edict
skills.desc: Yanfei creates a Scarlet Seal that deals AoE Pyro DMG and grants her the maximum number of Seal of Approval stacks.
skills.details_html:
Signed Edict
Yanfei creates a Scarlet Seal that deals AoE Pyro DMG and grants her the maximum number of Seal of Approval stacks.

skills.name: Done Deal
skills.desc: Yanfei creates a firestorm that deals massive Pyro DMG to all nearby enemies.
skills.details_html:
Done Deal
Yanfei creates a firestorm that deals massive Pyro DMG to all nearby enemies.

passive_talents.name: Encyclopedic Expertise
passive_talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

passive_talents.name: Blazing Eye
passive_talents.desc: When Yanfei's Charged Attack deals a CRIT Hit to opponents, she will deal an additional instance of AoE Pyro DMG equal to 80% of her ATK. This DMG counts as Charged Attack DMG.

passive_talents.name: Proviso
passive_talents.desc: When Yanfei consumes Seal of Approval, each Seal consumed will increase Yanfei's Pyro DMG Bonus by 5%. This effect lasts for 6s. When a Seal of Approval is consumed, the effect will be calculated based on the number of Seals consumed.

constellations.name: The Law Knows No Kindness
constellations.desc: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Seal of Approval additionally reduces the Stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during release.

constellations.name: Right of Final Interpretation
constellations.desc: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

constellations.name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Done Deal by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Supreme Amnesty
constellations.desc: When Done Deal is used: Creates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s. This shield absorbs Pyro DMG 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Abiding Affidavit
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Signed Edict by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Extra Clause
constellations.desc: Increases the maximum number of Seal of Approval by 1.
